posts.content:
Feb 1965 SO34 Westfalia



A rare opportunity to own one of the last (possibly the last) subhatch bus built.

Imported to the UK in 2004 from California. She has been garaged at all times and regularly sails through the MOT as I do minimal miles in her. The paint has faded giving it a very nice patina.

Currently running a 1600cc twinport motor with the rear converted to straight axle using a 1300cc bug box and T2D adjustable springplates.

New 4" narrowed CB Beam with Gabriel air shocks plumbed in up front with onboard compressor giving approx 3-4" of upwards travel.

New tyres all round: 165/50 fronts and 185/65 rears on 4.5" and 5.5" porsche chromies.

Both front and back brakes have been fully overhauled with all new parts and new brake lines fitted throughout with dual master cylinder upgrade. Braided lines used at the front.

I have the original beam and box which will go with the bus if required as all parts used in lowering it are bolt on items



Â£16995

Can you E mail me your number, Interested in the westy. Can you send pics to philpinch@hotmail.co.uk ,

Cheers Phil
